T02D3107:200b-1: a'ary'a dzi ta dh'a ra s'a tstsha bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D3107:200b-3: 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gyi s'a tstsha'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D3107:200b-4: 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3107:200b-5: dang po'i las can rnal 'byor pas //
T02D3107:200b-6: lus ngag sgrib pa sbyang ba dang //
T02D3107:200b-7: khyad par bsgrub pa'i las brtson pas //
T02D3107:200b-8: tsha tsha bya ba'i rim pa bstan //
T02D3107:200b-9: dang po yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs su thang bu bstar bar bya ste /
T02D3107:200b-10: de ru spos dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags sam /
T02D3107:200b-11: thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags zlos shing /
T02D3107:200b-12: gtor bas mi gtsang ba'i tshogs thams cad byang ste rin po che'i sa gzhir gyur par bsam /
T02D3107:200b-13: bgegs yod pa kun rang rang gi gnas su dengs par bya ste bka' bsgo ba yang bya'o //
T02D3107:200b-14: de nas dri bzang po la sogs pa'i chus skyang nu la byas /
T02D3107:200b-15: me tog sil ma dpag tu med pa bkram la /
T02D3107:200b-16: mchod pa la sogs pa'i yo byad kun tshogs par bya ste /
T02D3107:200b-17: gnas khang dang mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba'o //
T02D3107:200b-18: de nas bla mas khrus dang gtsang sbra bya ste /
T02D3107:200b-19: sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga rdzogs pas 'phags ma gdugs dkar can du bsam ste /
T02D3107:200b-20: tsha tsha'i sa brko ba der brtag pa dang /
T02D3107:200b-22: bkra shis pa'i phyag rgya'i lha mos gang bar byin gyis brlab /
T02D3107:200b-23: thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad pa dang /
T02D3107:200b-24: lha mo legs ldan la gtor ma byin la gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D3107:200b-25: sa bdag la gtor ma byin la bka' bsgo ba bya ste /
T02D3107:200b-26: de nas ji tsam brko ba'i sa de la seng
T02D3107:200b-27: ldeng la sogs ba'i phur bus phyogs bzhir btab ste
T02D3107:200b-28: / de yang stod legs ldan nam /
T02D3107:200b-29: lha mo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la smad phur par 'dug par bskyed la /
T02D3107:200b-30: byin gyis brlabs la aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya /
T02D3107:200b-31: sarba dusht'am h'um phat ces lan gsum bzlas la gdab bo //
T02D3107:200b-32: de nas bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i tshon skud rnam pa lnga rigs lnga'i rnam pa'am /
T02D3107:201a-0: rin lchen lnga'i rang bzhin du bsam @201a * //
T02D3107:201a-2: aom badzra s'u tra sa ma ya h'um phat ces bya ste /
T02D3107:201a-3: phur pa'i mtha' ma tshon skud kyis bskor la rang
T02D3107:201a-4: gi rkang pa gar gzhag par rdo rjer lam lam
T02D3107:201a-6: yang na sngags de thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bya'o //
T02D3107:201a-7: de nas thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags zlos shing yungs kar gyis gtor ro //
T02D3107:201a-8: de nas sa gzhi de rin po cher gyur bar bsams la rang ji tsam 'dod pa brkos te /
T02D3107:201a-9: de'i sngags kyang aom badzra kha na kha na ya h'um phat ces bya'o //
T02D3107:201a-10: de nas phur bu dang tshon skud bsdus 'o mas bskus te gzhag go //
T02D3107:201a-12: de nas blangs pa rnams stegs bu la sogs par bzhag las brdung ba'i las bya ste /
T02D3107:201a-13: sngags kyang aom badzra mungga ra a'a ko ta ya
T02D3107:201a-14: a'a ko ta ya h'um phat ces brjod cing rdo
T02D3107:201a-16: de nas spos chu la sogs pa'i chu la aom aa mri te h'um phat ces bzlas la /
T02D3107:201a-17: spos chu dmigs pa las aa dkar por bsam /
T02D3107:201a-18: de las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i 'od kyis spos chu thams cad khyab ste /
T02D3107:201a-19: bdud rtsir gyur par bsams te sbru'o //
T02D3107:201a-20: de'i sngags aom badzra pra ma rda ya pra marda ya h'um phat ces byas la sbru'o //
T02D3107:201a-21: de nas 'jim pa de bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'di brjod de ;
T02D3107:201a-22: aom sukshme sukshme mu ga te /
T02D3107:201a-26: sarba bh'u ta bha y'a nu ga te /
T02D3107:201a-27: ya ba de ya sho dzi ni /
T02D3107:201a-29: dharma r'a dza ya ba shi he /
T02D3107:201a-33: zhes brjod pas rang gi thugs las ye shes lnga'i
T02D3107:201a-34: 'od zer 'phros pas khams gsum sems can 'phags ma
T02D3107:201a-35: gdugs dkar mo can du byas /
T02D3107:201a-36: tshur la rig sngags la sogs sangs rgyas mchod pas 'jim pa la thim /
T02D3107:201a-37: zhu nas khyab pas rin po che rnam pa lnga'i
T02D3107:201a-38: rang bzhin du gyur par bsam ste stegs bu la
T02D3107:201a-39: gzhag go // de ni 'jim pa'i bya ba'o //
T02D3107:201a-41: de yang aom badzra badzrod bha ba ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:201a-43: de nas rang gi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros sems can gyi sgrib pa gsum sbyangs /
T02D3107:201a-44: 'phags ma gdugs dkar can du byas /
T02D3107:201a-46: 'dus pas 'bi 'bi la thim pas ye shes lnga'i
T02D3107:201b-0: @201b rang bzhin gyi shel sgong dag pa'i rnam pa'i
T02D3107:201b-1: gzhal yas khang du bsams te /
T02D3107:201b-2: de'i nang du yang gdan padma dang seng ge las
T02D3107:201b-3: 'phags ma gdugs dkar can dang phyag rgya'i lha mo
T02D3107:201b-5: 'di cho ga gsum gyis bskyed do //
T02D3107:201b-6: de nas aom las ye shes kyi 'od phyung la gzhal yas khang du byas te /
T02D3107:201b-7: gdan nas lha rdzogs pa'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed /
T02D3107:201b-8: ye shes pa gzhug / dza: h'um bam ho: zhes pas so //
T02D3107:201b-9: de nas rang gis kyang sbyang ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3107:201b-10: de nas 'bi 'bi rnams su aom aa na le
T02D3107:201b-11: dang phyag rgya'i sngags sam sa bon rnams kyang gzhug
T02D3107:201b-12: / gzhan srog shing brtan pa'i gzungs la sogs pa
T02D3107:201b-13: ci rigs par gzhug / rten 'brel dang dri ma
T02D3107:201b-14: med pa la sogs pa yang gzhug go //
T02D3107:201b-15: de la mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa yang rgyas par bya'o //
T02D3107:201b-16: de nas aom dharma dh'a tu garbhe dzva la sv'a h'a zhes brjod la /
T02D3107:201b-17: de las lha mo rnams bskul nas slar yang gzhug
T02D3107:201b-18: ste sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa rdul dang mnyam
T02D3107:201b-19: pas bdag dang sems can sbyangs te gzhug par bya'o
T02D3107:201b-20: // de nas mar byug pa ni aom aa ra dze pi ra dze sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:201b-22: byang chub kyi sems kyis bsgom par bsam mo //
T02D3107:201b-24: thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi dbyings
T02D3107:201b-25: rnam par dag par bzhugs par bsams te skol phor
T02D3107:201b-26: du bcug la / aom badzra dharma dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a zhes bya'o //
T02D3107:201b-27: de nas skol phor shes rab lag pa thabs su bsams te /
T02D3107:201b-28: brdung ba ni de ni gnyis su med par bsrub par bsams te /
T02D3107:201b-29: aom badzra mungga ra a'a ko ta ya h'um zhes pa'am /
T02D3107:201b-32: nye snying la sogs zlos shing gdab bo //
T02D3107:201b-33: de nas chos kyi sku las sprul sku gnyis kyis
T02D3107:201b-34: sems can gyi don byed par chos kyi dbyings las
T02D3107:201b-36: aom badzra dharm'a dha re sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:201b-38: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya
T02D3107:201b-39: ma h'a su kha badzra su ra ta sa ma
T02D3107:201b-40: ya stvam / de las gzugs sku gnyis byung bas
T02D3107:201b-41: 'gro ba thams cad kyi don bsam gyis mi khyab
T02D3107:201b-43: de nas gzugs skus ji ltar rigs pa ste /
T02D3107:202a-0: longs skus dag pa'i sems can gyi @202a * //
T02D3107:202a-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sam bho ka sa ma ya stvam zhes bya'o //
T02D3107:202a-3: sbrul skus ma dag pa dang po'i las can la sogs pa'i don byed par bsams la /
T02D3107:202a-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ni rma na k'a ya sa ma ya stvam zhes bya'o //
T02D3107:202a-5: de ni tsha tsha gdab pa'o //
T02D3107:202a-6: de nas sku gsum gyi ngo bo dang rang don ni gzhung mangs kyis dogs pas ma bris so //
T02D3107:202a-7: de la ye shes pa bstim pa dang mchod pa la sogs pa yang bya'o //
T02D3107:202a-8: de nas aom badzra phru shi sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:202a-9: zhes pas srog shing gzugs par bya'o //
T02D3107:202a-10: de nas sems can shes bcu ldan gyur cig /
T02D3107:202a-11: bstan pa yun rings gnas par shog / sems can
T02D3107:202a-13: kun bzang smon lam 'jug par shog / ces bya'o //
T02D3107:202a-14: de nas aom pra marda na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:202a-17: khams gsum sems can ma lus pa //
T02D3107:202a-18: stobs dang ma 'dres chos dang ni /
T02D3107:202a-19: dran pa nyer gzhag rnam thar brgyad //
T02D3107:202a-20: ye shes bzhi sogs ldan gyur shog / ces bya'o //
T02D3107:202a-21: aom pa da ka lam pa sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:202a-22: zhes brjod la dar gyi cod pan phul la /
T02D3107:202a-23: sems can rnams ni ma lus pas //
T02D3107:202a-24: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la //
T02D3107:202a-25: dar dang lhab lhub la sogs pa /
T02D3107:202a-26: byang chub bar du mchod par shog / ces bya'o //
T02D3107:202a-27: de nas aom pa da ka sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:202a-30: sems can rnams ni ma lus las //
T02D3107:202a-31: phyogs bcur bstan pa'i bdan gyis //
T02D3107:202a-32: 'tshe ba med cing chos ldan pas //
T02D3107:202a-33: grags pas rgyas par 'gengs par shog / ces bya'o
T02D3107:202a-34: de nas aom kumbhi ra dhva dza sv'a h'a zhes
T02D3107:202a-35: bya ste / chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan phul la /
T02D3107:202a-36: 'khor ba ma stong bar du ni //
T02D3107:202a-37: bdud bzhi dag las legs rgyal nas //
T02D3107:202a-38: ston pa'i bstan pa zab mo dag / mi nub rgyal mtshan thob par shog / ces bya'o //
T02D3107:202a-39: de nas aom pra ma na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:202a-41: khams gsum sems can ma lus pa //
T02D3107:202a-42: nyon mongs tshad pas gdung ba la //
T02D3107:202a-43: thugs rje byang chub sems kyi gdugs //
T02D3107:202a-44: phub pas bde bas tshim gyur shog / ces bya'o //
T02D3107:202a-45: de nas aom ratna m'a le tram zhes pas me tog phul la /
T02D3107:202a-46: yang na na ma: shr'i ya dha nu ga ta
T02D3107:202b-0: pra tishtha ta pushpa @202b ko ta no ta th'a
T02D3107:202b-1: ga t'a aarha te samyaka sam buddh'a ya /
T02D3107:202b-3: aom pushpe sv'a h'a zhes bya ba ste /
T02D3107:202b-4: 'khor ba'i sems can ma lus kun //
T02D3107:202b-5: mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs thob nas //
T02D3107:202b-6: blta bas mi ngoms gzugs kyis ni //
T02D3107:202b-7: sems can don rnams rdzogs byed shog / ces bya'o //
T02D3107:202b-8: de nas aom su na dha re dza ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:202b-9: zhes byas te gdan phul la /
T02D3107:202b-10: sems can ma lus sangs rgyas te //
T02D3107:202b-11: stobs bcu ldan pa glang po'i gdan //
T02D3107:202b-12: mi 'jigs seng ge'i gdan dang ldan //
T02D3107:202b-13: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rta yi gdan //
T02D3107:202b-14: dbang bcu thob pa rma bya'i gdan //
T02D3107:202b-15: thogs med shugs ldan mkha' lding gdan ;
T02D3107:202b-17: skyon gyis ma gos padma'i gdan //
T02D3107:202b-18: rang bzhin 'od gsal nyi zla'i gdan //
T02D3107:202b-19: gdan rnams myur du thob par shog / ces bya'o //
T02D3107:202b-20: de nas aom dha ra dha ra mi li dza le sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:202b-21: zhes gzhal yas khang du gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D3107:202b-22: ji ltar chos dbyings dag pa yi //
T02D3107:202b-23: gnas su bsam shes bzhud pa ltar //
T02D3107:202b-24: bdag sogs sems can thams cad kyang //
T02D3107:202b-25: dag pa'i gnas su gshegs gyur cig / de nas aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:202b-27: rin chen gzhal yas chos dbyings su //
T02D3107:202b-28: sems can don du brtser dgongs la //
T02D3107:202b-29: ji srid sems can byang chub bar //
T02D3107:202b-30: de srid du ni bzhugs par mdzod //
T02D3107:202b-32: de nas aom badzra dh'a tu sha ri ma tishthi h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes brjod la /
T02D3107:202b-33: dbang bskur te rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan par bya'o //
T02D3107:202b-34: de ni brtan par bya ba'i cho ga yin no //
T02D3107:202b-35: des ni phun sum tshogs pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D3107:202b-36: de nas slob dpon byang chub sems //
T02D3107:202b-37: ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod bya ste //
T02D3107:202b-38: bla med sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs //
T02D3107:202b-39: sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D3107:202b-40: bdud dang phyir rgol log 'dren tshogs //
T02D3107:202b-41: thams cad pham byas bde la dgod //
T02D3107:202b-42: sems can nying mtshams sbyor ba yi //
T02D3107:202b-43: nyon mongs ma lus sbyang bar bya //
T02D3107:202b-44: nga rgyal ri ni gzhom bya zhing //
T02D3107:202b-45: skye ba'i ljon shing gcad par bya //
T02D3107:202b-46: 'chi bdag srin po brlag bya ste //
T02D3107:202b-47: ma rig pa yi mun pa bsal //
T02D3107:202b-48: lta log yang dag lta la dgod //
T02D3107:203a-2: srid pa'i rgya mtsho yang bskam ste //
T02D3107:203a-3: chos sgron spar zhing byang chub lam //
T02D3107:203a-4: bstan par byas te bzod des byos //
T02D3107:203a-5: 'dod chags me dang zhe sdang mtshon //
T02D3107:203a-6: phrag dog 'tshub ma ser sna bdud //
T02D3107:203a-7: 'jig tshogs bdag gis gzhom par bgyi //
T02D3107:203a-8: sems can bde ba bla med kyis //
T02D3107:203a-9: byang chub lam la rab dgod phyir //
T02D3107:203a-10: bdag gi sdig bral mthun pa yi //
T02D3107:203a-11: dngos grub sna tshogs bdag la stsol //
T02D3107:203a-12: de nas dkyil 'khor du byas pa'am /
T02D3107:203a-13: yang na mchod rten bum par gdugs dkar can dmigs
T02D3107:203a-14: pa de las 'od zer 'phros pas phyag la sogs
T02D3107:203a-15: pa'i lha mos 'jig rten gyi khams khengs par bya
T02D3107:203a-16: ste / de dag gi sgrib pa gsum ma lus
T02D3107:203a-17: par dag par bya ste thams cad lha mo'i rang
T02D3107:203a-19: sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ngo bor dag par bya ste /
T02D3107:203a-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya wa ktsitta ma h'a sa ma ya stvam zhes bstan par bya'o//
T02D3107:203a-21: dung phor du dri chab la sogs pa blugs te /
T02D3107:203a-22: lag pas bzung la aa las zla ba'i rnam pa
T02D3107:203a-23: las 'od zer gyis yon chab bdud rtsir bsams la
T02D3107:203a-24: / gtso mo nas 'khor la sogs pa'i snying po bzlas te dbul lo //
T02D3107:203a-26: aom aa mri ta aargham pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:203a-27: zhes lan gsum du spyi bor bzhag la dgang /
T02D3107:203a-28: der ye shes sems dpa' spyan dras te dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02D3107:203a-29: de nas mchod pa lnga yang rang rang gi sngags kyis dbul /
T02D3107:203a-30: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis kyang mchod de /
T02D3107:203a-31: 'dir gzhung mangs kyis dogs pas ma bris so //
T02D3107:203a-32: mchod pa bsang ba dang sbyang ba ni /
T02D3107:203a-33: aom sarba p'u dza pu shpe sv'a h'a /
T02D3107:203a-35: de nas rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pas bstod pa bya ste /
T02D3107:203a-36: de yang dang po sbyir yang bstod pa ni /
T02D3107:203a-37: 'gro ba rgyud lnga'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D3107:203a-38: sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gzir ba'i 'gro gzigs nas //
T02D3107:203a-39: thugs rjes sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'joms mdzad pa //
T02D3107:203a-40: thugs rje'i mnga' bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3107:203a-41: sems can smin cing grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir //
T02D3107:203a-42: sems can khams na bzhugs shing spyod gyur kyang //
T02D3107:203a-43: chags pas mi gos padma ltar dag pa //
T02D3107:203b-0: 'dod chags @203b dag pa'i bdag nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D3107:203b-1: sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa la //
T02D3107:203b-2: thugs rjes thabs dang shes rab grur zhugs nas //
T02D3107:203b-3: zhi ba rin chen mchog gling skyel mdzad pa //
T02D3107:203b-4: kun gyi nged dpon lha mo khyod la 'dud //
T02D3107:203b-5: sems can bkren pa chos kyis phongs gyur pas //
T02D3107:203b-6: ma rig thibs po'i nang du song ba rnams //
T02D3107:203b-7: 'phags pa'i nor bdun dag gis tshim mdzad pa //
T02D3107:203b-8: ye shes sgron ma'i lha mo khyod la bstod //
T02D3107:203b-9: sems can las kyi chu bos 'bad pa rnams //
T02D3107:203b-10: dam chos bdud rtsi'i zam pas sgrol mdzad pa //
T02D3107:203b-11: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad la 'god mdzad pa //
T02D3107:203b-12: gsung gi mnga' bdag lha mo khyod la bstod //
T02D3107:203b-14: yang slob dpon tsandra go mis bstod ba'i srid gsum
T02D3107:203b-15: ston pa lha dang mi yis mchod 'os la sogs
T02D3107:203b-16: pas kyang bstod pa bya ste /
T02D3107:203b-17: de nas yon bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la bsams pas smon lam rgya chen po btab ste /
T02D3107:203b-18: bdag sogs sems can skal ldan 'di rnams kyis //
T02D3107:203b-19: chos kyi sku yi gzugs brnyan bzhengs pas ni //
T02D3107:203b-20: dge tshogs ma lus ci yod mdun byas te //
T02D3107:203b-21: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha mo thob par shog /'khor
T02D3107:203b-22: los sgyur rgyal mchog gi lus thob shog / phun
T02D3107:203b-23: sum tshogs pa'i zhing du skye bar shog / tshe
T02D3107:203b-25: 'byung po 'khrugs dang gdon kun zhi gyur shog / ces bya'o //
T02D3107:203b-26: shar phyogs su gzungs tshar gcig gam /
T02D3107:203b-27: gnyis sam gsum la sogs pa nye bar bshad pa ltar bklag / rgyas par byed na ;
T02D3107:203b-28: dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa'i byang du slob ma 'dug la /
T02D3107:203b-29: bkra shis kyi dbang la sogs pa bskur bar bya'o //
T02D3107:203b-30: de nas bsdu gshegs gtor ma btang ba kun bya /
T02D3107:203b-31: khyad par du legs ldan gyi mchod pa bya'o //
T02D3107:203b-32: de nas dge 'dun gyi mchod ston la sogs ba kun bya'o //
T02D3107:203b-33: tsha tsha'i cho ga 'di byas pas //
T02D3107:203b-34: khams gsum ma lus sems can kun //
T02D3107:203b-35: lha mo nyid dang skal mnyam nas //
T02D3107:203b-36: gdul bya'i don la myur brtson shog / tsha tsha'i
T02D3107:203b-37: bya ba slob dpon padma'i lcags kyus mdzad pa rdzogs
